In three sentences
Comments
I am glad to say that I feel safe at CSUB. Campus security has an outstanding force of police men and woman to protect our campus.
CSUB has dozens of clubs partaking in a vast amount of interests! Some include, but is not limited too, the biology club, geology, campus gamers, Japan and beyond, filipino club, and dozens more!

If you're and athlete, CSUB has a great coaching staff that will push you to your limits to succeed. Music students of the band variety can participate in the pep band, jazz ensemble, concert band, symphonic band, and various jazz combos. If you plan on nursing, CSUB has an up to date nursing lab filled with all things needed. Engineering majors can look forward to the new engineering labs which include 3D printers to make you dreams a reality! Lastly CSUB is great for the student that wants a home town feel with a big university experience. CSUB is YOUR UNIVERSITY!
On campus you'll see swing sets around much like a park setting. CSUB has a campus that is relaxing making the college stress free. The campus also has a coi pond that includes real fish and turtles!

The faculty and staff at CSUB strive to keep the students active. CSUB has their up to date brand new red center which is all free of charge with tuition. The student union also has events to raise school spirt, which also comes with great helpings of free food!!!!

CSUB is in the prime location of Bakersfield. When you're not rock climbing in the rec center you can have a try at the on campus ping pong and the various student union activities that happen daily! When you some how get bored you can just cross the street and visit one of Bakersfield premier location, the marketplace. Just down the street on stockdale hwy you can partake in many out door concerts at the Bakersfield ampetherater as well as see the fine eatery by the River Wallk.

There are not a lot of food choices on campus and the very little there is it is not the best, however, CSUB is in the prime location of Bakersfield and great food can be found 2 mins from the campus!
CSUB just had their new housing complex open up in January of 2015. Dorm life is unique and diverse; you're bound to do something new everyday!
Professors here like to challenge your mind and introduce new perspectives.
Do not look over this school beacause it's Bakersfield! The school is enriched with college life and gives as much opertunities as any other CSU!

California State University Bakersfield is exactly what it is, a California State University. I have gotten full support through my professors and the local vibe definitely makes me feel like I'm home! Professors are fantastic and enthusiastic in what they do!

textAfterTable: Am enjoying being here The school has everything a student might be looking for. The school has a recreation center, a health center, a counselling center, a library, and a career development center. What more could you ask for? Am learning a lot The teachers at CSU Bakersfield strive to provide an atmosphere that both teaches as well as entertains, for that reason I feel like I am constantly learning.
